## Mod.onError() method

General error handler.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onError(errorCallback: (messageCallback: string) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  errorCallback | <code>(messageCallback: string) =&gt; void</code> | callback that will be invoked each time an error occur. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
